update test_plan
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_id = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator_uid = #{record.creatorUid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
befores = #{record.befores,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR,typeHandler=com.yqhp.typehandler.BeforeTypeHandler},
test_suites = #{record.testSuites,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR,typeHandler=com.yqhp.typehandler.IntegerTypeHandler},

update test_plan
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creator_uid = #{creatorUid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

befores = #{befores,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR,typeHandler=com.yqhp.typehandler.BeforeTypeHandler},
test_suites = #{testSuites,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR,typeHandler=com.yqhp.typehandler.IntegerTypeHandler},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
